languages.text: If there are 2 or more enemies in a 2-cell radius around the Arbitrator, no critical hits can be scored against the Arbitrator or their Pet, and the Arbitrator's and their Pet critical hit chance is increased by +{uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}%. Whenever an enemy adjacent to the Arbitrator raises from being prone, that enemy provokes an attack of opportunity from the Arbitrator.

traits.locale_text: If there are 2 or more enemies in a 2-cell radius around the Arbitrator, no critical hits can be scored against the Arbitrator or their Pet, and the Arbitrator's and their Pet critical hit chance is increased by +{uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}%. Whenever an enemy adjacent to the Arbitrator raises from being prone, that enemy provokes an attack of opportunity from the Arbitrator.

languages.text: If there are 2 or more enemies in a 2-cell radius around the Arbitrator, no {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} can be scored against the Arbitrator or their familiar, and the Arbitrator and their familiar's critical hit chance is increased by +{uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}%. Whenever an enemy adjacent to the Arbitrator gets up from being {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, that enemy provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} from the Arbitrator.
languages.original_text: Если в радиусе 2 клеток от арбитра находятся 2 или больше врагов, по нему и его фамильяру нельзя совершить {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g}, а шанс критического попадания арбитра и его фамильяра увеличивается на {uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}%. Когда с противника на соседней с арбитром клетке снимается эффект {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывание{/g}, арбитр совершает по нему {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаку по возможности{/g}.

traits.locale_text: If there are 2 or more enemies in a 2-cell radius around the Arbitrator, no critical hits can be scored against the Arbitrator, and the Arbitrator's critical hit chance is increased by +{uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}%. Whenever an enemy adjacent to the Arbitrator raises from being prone, that enemy provokes an attack of opportunity from the Arbitrator.

If there are 2 or more enemies in a 2-cell radius around the Arbitrator, no {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} can be scored against the Arbitrator or their familiar, and the Arbitrator and their familiar's critical hit chance is increased by +{uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}%. Whenever an enemy adjacent to the Arbitrator gets up from being {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, that enemy provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} from the Arbitrator.

If there are 2 or more enemies in a 2-cell radius around the Arbitrator, no {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} can be scored against the Arbitrator or their familiar, and the Arbitrator and their familiar's critical hit chance is increased by +{uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}%. Whenever an enemy adjacent to the Arbitrator gets up from being {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, that enemy provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} from the Arbitrator.

If there are 2 or more enemies in a 2-cell radius around the Arbitrator, the Arbitrator cannot suffer {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g}, and the Arbitrator's critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} is increased by +{uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}%. Whenever an enemy adjacent to the Arbitrator stands up from being Prone — they provoke an attack of opportunity.

languages.text: Если в радиусе 2 клеток от арбитра находятся 2 или больше врагов, по нему и его фамильяру нельзя совершить {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g}, а шанс критического попадания арбитра и его фамильяра увеличивается на {uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}%. Когда с противника на соседней с арбитром клетке снимается эффект {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывание{/g}, арбитр совершает по нему {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаку по возможности{/g}.
languages.original_text: If there are 2 or more enemies in a 2-cell radius around the Arbitrator, no {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} can be scored against the Arbitrator or their familiar, and the Arbitrator and their familiar's critical hit chance is increased by +{uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}%. Whenever an enemy adjacent to the Arbitrator gets up from being {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, that enemy provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} from the Arbitrator.

traits.locale_text: Если в радиусе 2 клеток от арбитра находятся 2 или больше врагов, по нему и его фамильяру нельзя совершить критическое попадание, а шанс критического попадания арбитра и его фамильяра увеличивается на {uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}%. Когда с противника на соседней с арбитром клетке снимается эффект опрокидывание, арбитр совершает по нему атаку по возможности.

Если в радиусе 2 клеток от арбитра находятся 2 или больше врагов, по нему и его фамильяру нельзя совершить критическое попадание, а шанс критического попадания арбитра и его фамильяра увеличивается на {uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}%. Когда с противника на соседней с арбитром клетке снимается эффект опрокидывание, арбитр совершает по нему атаку по возможности.

languages.text: Yargıcı'nın çevresindeki 2 hücrelik yarıçap içinde 2 veya daha fazla düşman varsa Yargıcı'ya veya iyesine karşı {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} yapılamaz. Ayrıca Yargıcı ve iyesinin kritik vuruş olasılıkları +%{uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3} artar. Yargıcı'nın bitişiğindeki bir düşman, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilme{/g} etkisinden kurtulup ayağa kalkarsa Yargıcı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırısını{/g} tetikler.
languages.original_text: If there are 2 or more enemies in a 2-cell radius around the Arbitrator, no {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} can be scored against the Arbitrator or their familiar, and the Arbitrator and their familiar's critical hit chance is increased by +{uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}%. Whenever an enemy adjacent to the Arbitrator gets up from being {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, that enemy provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} from the Arbitrator.

traits.locale_text: Yargıcı'nın çevresindeki 2 hücrelik yarıçap içinde 2 veya daha fazla düşman varsa Yargıcı'ya veya iyesine karşı kritik vuruş yapılamaz. Ayrıca Yargıcı ve iyesinin kritik vuruş olasılıkları +%{uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3} artar. Yargıcı'nın bitişiğindeki bir düşman, yere devrilme etkisinden kurtulup ayağa kalkarsa Yargıcı'nın fırsat saldırısını tetikler.

Yargıcı'nın çevresindeki 2 hücrelik yarıçap içinde 2 veya daha fazla düşman varsa Yargıcı'ya veya iyesine karşı {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} yapılamaz. Ayrıca Yargıcı ve iyesinin kritik vuruş olasılıkları +%{uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3} artar. Yargıcı'nın bitişiğindeki bir düşman, yere devrilme etkisinden kurtulup ayağa kalkarsa Yargıcı'nın fırsat saldırısını tetikler.

languages.text: Si hay 2 enemigos o más en un radio de 2 casillas alrededor del Arbitrator, no podrán infligirse {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impactos críticos{/g} al Arbitrator ni a su familiar, y la probabilidad de impacto crítico tanto del Arbitrator como de su familiar aumenta en un +{uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3} %. Cada vez que un enemigo {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} adyacente al Arbitrator se levante, provocará un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g} del Arbitrator.
languages.original_text: If there are 2 or more enemies in a 2-cell radius around the Arbitrator, no {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} can be scored against the Arbitrator or their familiar, and the Arbitrator and their familiar's critical hit chance is increased by +{uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}%. Whenever an enemy adjacent to the Arbitrator gets up from being {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, that enemy provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} from the Arbitrator.

traits.locale_text: Si hay 2 enemigos o más en un radio de 2 casillas alrededor del Arbitrator, no podrán infligirse impactos críticos al Arbitrator ni a su familiar, y la probabilidad de impacto crítico tanto del Arbitrator como de su familiar aumenta en un +{uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3} %. Cada vez que un enemigo derribado adyacente al Arbitrator se levante, provocará un ataque de oportunidad del Arbitrator.

languages.text: 如果距离法务官2格范围内至少有2名敌人，则法务官与其使仆不会受到{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}，且法务官与其使仆的暴击率提高{uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}%。每当与法务官邻近的敌人从{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态中起身时，法务官都会对其进行{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
languages.original_text: If there are 2 or more enemies in a 2-cell radius around the Arbitrator, no {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} can be scored against the Arbitrator or their familiar, and the Arbitrator and their familiar's critical hit chance is increased by +{uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}%. Whenever an enemy adjacent to the Arbitrator gets up from being {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, that enemy provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} from the Arbitrator.

traits.locale_text: 如果距离法务官2格范围内至少有2名敌人，则法务官与其使仆不会受到暴击，且法务官与其使仆的暴击率提高{uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}%。每当与法务官邻近的敌人从倒地状态中起身时，法务官都会对其进行借机攻击。

languages.text: S'il y a au moins 2 ennemis dans un rayon de 2 cases autour de l'arbitrator, son familier et lui ne peuvent subir aucun {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} et leurs chances de coup critique augmentent de +{uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3} %. Quand un ennemi adjacent à l'arbitrator se relève après avoir été {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}paralysé{/g}, l'arbitrator effectue une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g}.
languages.original_text: If there are 2 or more enemies in a 2-cell radius around the Arbitrator, no {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} can be scored against the Arbitrator or their familiar, and the Arbitrator and their familiar's critical hit chance is increased by +{uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}%. Whenever an enemy adjacent to the Arbitrator gets up from being {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, that enemy provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} from the Arbitrator.

traits.locale_text: S'il y a au moins 2 ennemis dans un rayon de 2 cases autour de l'arbitrator, son familier et lui ne peuvent subir aucun coup critique et leurs chances de coup critique augmentent de +{uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3} %. Quand un ennemi adjacent à l'arbitrator se relève après avoir été paralysé, l'arbitrator effectue une attaque d'opportunité.

languages.text: アービトレイターの半径2セル以内2体以上の敵がいる場合、アービトレイターまたはその味方に対して {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}が発生しなくなり、アービトレイターとその味方のクリティカル率は+{uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}%増加する。アービトレイターに隣接する敵が{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱状態{/g}から復活すると、その敵はアービトレイターからの{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を引き起こす。
languages.original_text: If there are 2 or more enemies in a 2-cell radius around the Arbitrator, no {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} can be scored against the Arbitrator or their familiar, and the Arbitrator and their familiar's critical hit chance is increased by +{uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}%. Whenever an enemy adjacent to the Arbitrator gets up from being {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, that enemy provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} from the Arbitrator.

traits.locale_text: アービトレイターの半径2セル以内2体以上の敵がいる場合、アービトレイターまたはその味方に対してクリティカルヒットが発生しなくなり、アービトレイターとその味方のクリティカル率は+{uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}%増加する。アービトレイターに隣接する敵が脆弱状態から復活すると、その敵はアービトレイターからの機会攻撃を引き起こす。

languages.text: Gibt es in einem Radius von 2 Feldern um den Arbitrator 2 oder mehr Gegner, sind gegen den Arbitrator oder seinen Vertrauten keine {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} möglich. Ferner erhöht sich die Kritische Trefferchance des Arbitrators und seines Vertrauten um +{uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3} %. Endet der {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt{/g}-Effekt eines Gegners auf einem benachbarten Feld, provoziert dieser einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} des Arbitrators.
languages.original_text: If there are 2 or more enemies in a 2-cell radius around the Arbitrator, no {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} can be scored against the Arbitrator or their familiar, and the Arbitrator and their familiar's critical hit chance is increased by +{uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}%. Whenever an enemy adjacent to the Arbitrator gets up from being {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, that enemy provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} from the Arbitrator.

traits.locale_text: Gibt es in einem Radius von 2 Feldern um den Arbitrator 2 oder mehr Gegner, sind gegen den Arbitrator oder seinen Vertrauten keine kritischen Treffer möglich. Ferner erhöht sich die Kritische Trefferchance des Arbitrators und seines Vertrauten um +{uip|Damage|613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3} %. Endet der Hingestreckt-Effekt eines Gegners auf einem benachbarten Feld, provoziert dieser einen Gelegenheitsangriff des Arbitrators.
